creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: landscape with two figures: large rocks in foreground with trees; two figures facing away from viewer at LL, one is taller and wears a white coat, the other is shorter and carries a large red bundle; tall, narrow mountains in background at UL; blue mountains at UR
markings: UR, square intaglio: 長興私印; UR, square relief: 鵬斎間人; LRC, square intaglio: 两袖清風; sticker R roller end: [Bosai / (?) / Kobayashi]
title: Landscape with Qin
